WorkItem.ClosedComment: Should be resolved when UI component is availble for creating categories
WorkItem.Description: If you create a category with a space in it (i.e. News & Entertainment) clicking on the category produces an error. The URL does not support spaces and other illegal characters.

Comments.Message: Currently, there are no way to manage category from UI, you have to populate it in database. Category/Tag has two properties Name and Unique Name. Name is for display and Unique name is used in the Url. You can put News & Entertainment in Name and News-Entertainment in the UniqueName to resolve this.
